descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Monte Morris comes away with a steal, and Jeff Green gets it on the other end for a Nuggets bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Monte Morris makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/01/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morris' steal leads to Green's bucket

videos.description: Cade Cunningham passes to Hamidou Diallo, who finishes with a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hamidou Diallo flies in for a 1-handed jam) 2022/1/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hamidou Diallo flies in for a 1-handed jam

videos.description: Jeff Green drives in to finish with a nice basket while drawing a foul.

videos.headline: Jeff Green puts in an acrobatic and-1 bucket

videos.description: Cade Cunningham hustles back on defense and swats Aaron Gordon for the Pistons vs. the Nuggets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham with the massive block at the rim) 2022/01/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham gets back on D for big block

videos.description: Cade Cunningham splashes in a 3 to close the gap for the Pistons
